text: Jiajie an la de mingyi er zaoyao, huo fouren qi jixiang zhe, you shei bi tamen hai bu yi ne? Zhe deng ren jiang zaoyu tian jing zhong wei tamen yuding de mingyun, zhidao wo de zhong shizhe lai shi tamen siwang de shihou, jiang dui tamen shuo:“Nimen congqian she an la er qidao de (ouxiang), xianzai zai nali ne? Tamen jiang shuo:“Tamen yi huibi womenle.” Tamen jiangyao chengren ziji yuan shi bu xindao zhe
